Description:
Detection of sc.exe utility adding a new service with special permission which hides that service.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Service Security Descriptor Tampering Via Sc.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%sdset%' and (process_path like '%\sc.exe' and original_file_name = 'sc.exe'))
